casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Timothy Lamont HILL. No. 505P00-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Timothy Lamont Hill, Pro Se. William N. Farrell, Jr., Senior Deputy Attorney General, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State,

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 17th day of May 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Rutherford County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th day of August 2005."
